hero.headline: Premium Wisconsin Beef, Delivered to Your Door
hero.description: From our family farm to your family table. Experience the exceptional quality of sustainably raised beef, shipped fresh nationwide.

featuredSection.title: Customer Favorites
featuredSection.description: Our most popular cuts, hand-selected for exceptional quality and flavor. Every order is vacuum-sealed and flash-frozen for peak freshness.

categoriesSection.title: Shop by Category
categoriesSection.description: Find exactly what you're looking for

benefits.title: Pasture-Raised
benefits.description: Our cattle graze on lush Wisconsin pastures, resulting in beef with superior flavor and nutrition.

benefits.title: No Hormones or Antibiotics
benefits.description: We never use growth hormones or unnecessary antibiotics. Just healthy cattle, naturally raised.

benefits.title: Dry-Aged for Perfection
benefits.description: Our steaks are dry-aged for a minimum of 21 days, developing deep, complex flavors.

benefits.title: Direct from the Source
benefits.description: Skip the middleman. Our beef goes from our farm to your door, ensuring freshness and fair pricing.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Getting premium beef delivered to your door has never been easier

steps.title: Choose Your Cuts
steps.description: Browse our selection of premium steaks, roasts, ground beef, and value bundles. Select exactly what you need.

steps.title: We Pack & Ship
steps.description: Your order is vacuum-sealed, packed in insulated boxes with dry ice, and shipped directly to your door via expedited delivery.

steps.title: Enjoy Quality Beef
steps.description: Receive your order frozen and ready to store. Thaw and cook whenever you're ready for an exceptional meal.

items.text: The ribeyes from Spaeth Farms are hands-down the best steaks I've ever cooked at home. The marbling is incredible and the flavor is unmatched.
items.author: Michael R.

items.text: We ordered the Family Essentials Bundle and it fed our family of five for over a month. Great variety and amazing quality at a fair price.
items.author: Sarah & Tom K.

items.text: Shipping was fast and everything arrived frozen solid. You can really taste the difference when beef is raised right. We're customers for life!
items.author: David L.

ctaSection.title: Ready to Taste the Difference?
ctaSection.description: Join thousands of families who have discovered the exceptional quality of Spaeth Farms beef. Free shipping on orders over $199.

contactBanner.title: Have Questions?
contactBanner.subtitle: We're here to help. Reach out anytime.
